name: Salesforce Service Cloud - Send notifications to Case Owner
description: When there is a new/updated object in Salesforce, do action and other actions

input.field_list:
OwnerId
Id
CaseNumber
Priority
Status
Subject
LastModifiedById
AccountId
input.query: LastModifiedById NOT IN (SELECT Id FROM User WHERE Alias = 'workato')

extended_input_schema.name: since_offset
extended_input_schema.label: When first started, this recipe should pick up events from
extended_input_schema.hint: When starting the recipe for the first time, picks up Salesforce records from the specified date and time. Once the recipe has been run or tested, this value cannot be changed.

toggle_field.hint: When starting the recipe for the first time, picks up Salesforce records from the specified date and time. Once the recipe has been run or tested, this value cannot be changed.
toggle_field.name: since

toggle_field.label: Default Notification Frequency when Joining Groups
toggle_field.name: DefaultGroupNotificationFrequency

extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe LOG_EVENT (do not wait for response)

properties.label: slackUserName
properties.name: slack_user_name
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Case comments using SOQL
block.description: Search Case comments using SOQL query in Salesforce

input.field_list:
Id
ParentId
CommentBody
SystemModstamp
LastModifiedDate
CreatedById
CreatedDate
LastModifiedById
input.query:
ParentId  =  '#{_('data.salesforce.updated_custom_object_webhook.Id')}'  AND 
LastModifiedByID  !='#{_('data.salesforce.updated_custom_object_webhook.OwnerId')}'  order by LastModifiedDate  DESC

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
